com.risk.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Player
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Define class of a player The following is only base code, further features need to be added

                   Country defender,

                   boolean isAllOut)
        Method for attack operation
        Parameters:
        attacker - The country who start an attack
        attackerNum - how many dice the attacker choose
        defender - The country who defend
        defenderNum - how many dice the defender choose
        isAllOut - true, if the attacker want to all-out; else false

      • isValidAttack

        public boolean isValidAttack(Country attacker,
                             java.lang.String attackerNum,
                             Country defender,
                             java.lang.String defenderNum)
        Test if attack is valid
        Parameters:
        attacker - The country who start the attack
        attackerNum - how many dise the attacker will use in this attack
        defender - The country who defend the attack
        defenderNum - how many dise the defender will use in this attack
        Returns:
        if two country is adjacent, and their dice is less the armies they owned, return true, else false
